name: microbin
description: Microbin is a self-hosted pastebin service that allows sharing text or code snippets with optional expiration. It supports private pastes, syntax highlighting, and a minimal, fast web UI.
features: Text sharing: Create pastes for code snippets, logs, or notes with unique URLs for easy sharing.
Syntax highlighting: Display code with language-specific formatting for improved readability across 100+ languages.
Expiration control: Set pastes to automatically delete after a specified time or number of views for temporary sharing.
Private pastes: Create password-protected pastes that require authentication before viewing content.
Raw text access: Retrieve paste content as plain text via direct URLs for command-line tools and scripts.
File uploads: Share small files alongside text content for comprehensive information sharing in one paste.
Burn after reading: Configure pastes to self-destruct after first view for sensitive information sharing.
Minimal footprint: Run with low memory and CPU requirements, suitable for resource-constrained environments.
